name: Trey Anderson
text: Great stock for card and trucks. Excellent service

name: Kevin Barnette
text: Its ok. They always have to order every part I go in there far.

name: Jessica Howard
text: We were going down the highway near Birmingham and had a blowout on our motorhome,  we called Action Tire Co. And they had a tire for us delivered to them by the time we got to the shop. Then they had us fixed and secure and back on the road in no time. I gave this company 5 stars and I'd give them 10 if I could. Gil and Sam took care of us I feel so very blessed. If your in this area and need tires for your truck or motorhome this is the place to go!

resp.text: Jessica, having a blow out on the highway is never a fun experience, and we're glad you all were safe. It was our pleasure helping you out quickly, and it's great to hear Gil and Sam led the way the whole time. We hope you've been well over the last few months, and we'll be here if you're ever in the area and in need of our services. -The team at Action Tire Company - Birmingham

name: Cory Nabors
text: These guys are great! I have been using these guys for all my wheel and tire needs and they come through every time. Price, service, expertise, and quality that can't be beat. Call them now!

resp.text: Cory, making sure our customers wheels are in wheelie great shape is the name of the game here. It's awesome to know our team has come through for you any time you needed us, and we appreciate that you trust us to get the job done right every time. You know we'll continue to be here ready to tackle any other tire issues you might need help with whenever you need us. -The team at Action Tire Company - Birmingham

name: Mark Swearingen
text: Erased Last Post,  Because of a Miscommunication,  over the phone.  Monday 6/29/20, Started Off Bad, but at the End of the day,  Action Tire was There and came through,  and Even Discounted Them More then Original Price over the Phone., Thank You Action Tire.

resp.text: We apologize for the confusion with your tires, Mark. We understand how this could be frustrating for you, and we hope that we can get in touch soon and resolve everything. -The Team at Action Tire Company

name: Steven Dempsey
text: Great service, very professional and polite guys! Highly recommended!

resp.text: Steven, professionalism is our middle name! Thanks for choosing us to get your car back on the road safely, and we'll be here to help if you ever need a hand in the future. -The team at Action Tire Company - Birmingham

name: Mark Heath
text: 2 hours from home on I-65 I blow out a tire on the outskirts of Birmingham.  I find Action Tire on a Google search.    One hour later I have the tire of my choice installed right there in the emergency lane of I-65 for a reasonable price and I’m on my way!   Highly recommend!

name: Hunter Hill
text: Great guys and very polite. They made replacing the tires on our customers crane a breeze. I would recommend them to any one.

name: Morgen Lewis
text: I was impressed with the friendly and knowledgeable staff. They had the tires I was looking for and answered every question I threw at them without batting an eye. This is the place to come if you are looking for commercial tires!
